name: Blackguard by level 8 when taking Bard, RDD?
author: eltalstro

posts.author: eltalstro
posts.content: Is this possible? I'm already planning a second run-through of A Hunt Through the Dark. It stipulates that you must take BG by level 8 (although I have not tested this) and you must take Elf (you can take subrace Drow to get bonuses to CHA and INT). The earliest I could get it to work for an elf in the CBC is lvl 9. Is it possible to get it down to 8 somehow?

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
Not with Bard alone, no.
You need BAB 6 and Cleave. Bard get BAB 6 at lvl 8. If you combine Bard4(max) with a Full BAB class you can get it earlier. 3 lvls of a full-BAB class to be precise. Fighter-Ranger-Barb.

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
The Blackguard series is a different matter!
It is true that you need to take a level of BG there before you can finsh act I,  and if I recall correctly, you end act I at lvl 9. If your character ends at lvl 8 and doesn't have enough xp to get that first lvl of BG, you can always use a Console command to level up, just to pass that obstacle.
